import React, { useEffect, useMemo, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { icons } from '../../helpers/icon' import { useWallet } from 'use-wallet' import { provider } from 'web3-core' import { getContractOf } from '../../utils/erc20' import ERC20ABI from '../../assets/abi/ERC20ABI.json'; import LudusGenesis001 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis001.png' import LudusGenesis002 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis002.png' import LudusGenesis003 from '../../assets/img/ludusGenesis003.png' import CustomButton from '../../components/CustomButton/CustomButton' const FarmsContent: React.FC = () => { const { account } = useWallet() const [ludusGenesis001, setLudusGenesis001] = useState(0) const [ludusGenesis002, setLudusGenesis002] = useState(0) const [ludusGenesis003, setLudusGenesis003] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { if(account !== null) { const erc20Contract = getContractOf(ERC20ABI, account as provider, '0xd9bE442ACe8665C6046B1D365BF1C20a2D75Fd0f'); console.log('erc20Contract', erc20Contract) } }, [account]) return (
NFT Staking
Ludus Genesis 001
(ludusGenesis001 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis001(ludusGenesis001 - 1)}>
{ludusGenesis001}
(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis001(ludusGenesis001 + 1)}>

(ludusGenesis002 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis002(ludusGenesis002 - 1)}>

(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis002(ludusGenesis002 + 1)}>

(ludusGenesis003 === 0 || !account) ? null : setLudusGenesis003(ludusGenesis003 - 1)}>
{ludusGenesis003}
(!account) ? null : setLudusGenesis003(ludusGenesis003 + 1)}>

) } export default FarmsContent
